author: ghudson
msg: Add node-rev information to support history tracing, after discussion
with jpieper.
* libsvn_fs_fs/structure: Add copyroot field to identify the root
of a node-copy, and add a flag to copyfrom to indicate whether a
copy is hard or soft.  (A soft copy is the result of modifying
a node-rev within a copied directory; when tracing history from
a soft copy, you have to look at the history of the parent
directory.)

author: ghudson
msg: Make up most of a rev file format for libsvn_fs_fs.
* libsvn_fs_fs/structure: Pick a rev file format (not written in
stone).  Still need to do the changed-path data.
* libsvn_fs_fs/README: In the long run, we will have no plain
texts in the repository, only self-compressed deltas.  So,
since it's not much harder, use "all self-compressed deltas"
in the initial implementation, rather than "all plain texts."

author: ringstrom
msg: Followup to r9280 to fix the reduction in fs test quality pointed out
by Brane.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_fs/fs-test.c
(medium_file_integrity, large_file_integrity): Use SVN_DELTA_WINDOW_SIZE
instead of SVN_STREAM_CHUNK_SIZE since we are supposed to be testing the
delta window edge cases.
* subversion/libsvn_delta/delta.h
(SVN_DELTA_WINDOW_SIZE): Moved here from text_delta.c.
* subversion/libsvn_delta/text_delta.c
(SVN_DELTA_WINDOW_SIZE): Moved to delta.h.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * build/generator/gen_make.py (write): Remove Python2 idiom.

author: brane
msg: * notes/webdav-acl-notes: Add some comments gleaned from the
stream of consciousness.
